name: CloudNews
0:
”Alexa open cloud news”
”Alexa ask cloud news to report”
”Alexa tell cloud news to report”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cloud news
des: Cloud News is a tiny alexa app that enables you to get daily cloud news by just saying "Alexa, open cloud news!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
